



      ¡î ¡î ¡î The Pixel Man ¡î ¡î ¡î


Demo game for Moenen-Pixel-Collection. Have fun with it : )


The Pixel Man is a cross-boudary demo game for Moenen Pixel Collection. 
Kill the boss at the bottom stage to get a super coin and win the game. 
Collect 4 coins to win perfectly.


Please feel free to modify and use the source code and assets in that game, but not sell the game without change it.


List of this collection:
	
	MPC - Character		http://u3d.as/Tjd
	MPC - Environment	http://u3d.as/Tjg
	MPC - Props			http://u3d.as/Tjh
	MPC - Vegetation	http://u3d.as/Tjj
	MPC - Vehicle		http://u3d.as/Tjo
